repliclust.random_centers.RandomCenters¶

class repliclust.random_centers.RandomCenters(packing=0.1)¶

Sample cluster centers uniformly at random within a bounded region.

packingfloat, >0

The volume density of clusters within the sampling box. Can be greater than 1, but then clusters are guaranteed to overlap.

sample_cluster_centers(blueprint)

__init__(packing=0.1)¶

Instantiate a RandomCenters object.

Methods

Sample cluster centers uniformly at random within a bounded region.
